lines: Well, well my dear friend, look at you!
So radiant in your cute costume and what about those magnificent horses of yours!
Everything seems perfect, alas, there is one thing missing in your marvelous companionship:
Some music to lift one’s spirits, up, up and in the air, my friend. Well then, I’m at your service!
options: Promise a place in your carriage

lines: Thank you. I shall see you on board.
I can tell that you will miss my music. But alas, so be it then.
